dmca.title: Online Jewelry Retailer Complains Marketing Text Infringed
dmca.body:
COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTIFICATION

1. Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed.
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/januarybirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/februarybirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/marchbirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/aprilbirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/junebirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/julybirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/augustbirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/septemberbirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/octoberbirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/novemberbirthstone.html
	http://www.about-birthstones.com/decemberbirthstone.html

The article content of each page has been copied word-for-word.

2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.

(multiple web sites, all registered to the same owner)

http://www.januaryjewelry.com/About_Garnet
http://www.februaryjewelry.com/About_Amethyst
http://www.marchjewelry.com/About_Aquamarine
http://www.apriljewelry.com/About_Diamonds
http://www.junejewelry.com/About_Pearls
http://www.julyjewelry.com/About_Ruby
http://www.augustjewelry.com/About_Peridot
http://www.septemberjewelry.com/About_Sapphire
http://www.octoberjewelry.com/About_Opal
http://www.novemberjewelry.com/About_Citrine
http://www.decemberjewelry.com/About_Blue_Topaz

3. Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you  (email address is preferred). 
[private]@about-birthstones.com

4. Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred).
	per their web site on page contact info: [private]@vjewel.com
	per their whois info: [private]@j-n.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law,

I swear, under penalty of perjury that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Submitted By: [private]
